Package game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Your main game entry point Contains all the necessary methods to switch through different user views and panels

    gameEndedOne()
    This method stops and removes the first level user view and replaces it with a game over panel We check if the high score has been reached by reading from the previous high score and comparing the current one

  • Method Details

    • instructionPage

      public void instructionPage()
      Creates an object of type Intruction which is a JPanel that has some text in it. We remove the previous view and add the instruction panel to our global frame

    • returnFromInstructions

      public void returnFromInstructions()

    • gameEndedOne

      public void gameEndedOne() throws IOException
      This method stops and removes the first level user view and replaces it with a game over panel We check if the high score has been reached by reading from the previous high score and comparing the current one
      Throws:
      IOException

    • gameSuccess

      public void gameSuccess() throws IOException
      When the main character reaches the last door of level 3, a success panel is added This is followed by a SoundClip of a victory sound with any high scores reached displayed
      Throws:
      IOException
